steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(3), number_in_box(1), put_result_into_box(3)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(1), 2), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(9), 2), number_in_box(6)), then_go_to_step(5), then_go_to_step(4)),
Put(number_in_box(4), into_box(3)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(1), 2), number_in_box(8)), then_go_to_step(6), then_go_to_step(1)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(1), 2), increase(2)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(1), 1), number_in_box(2)), then_go_to_step(7), then_go_to_step(8)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(4), 2), increase(1)),
Put(number_in_box(1), into_box(7)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 3?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在3号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Multiply: ( number in box 3 ) * ( number in box 1 ), put result into box 3.
Change Instruction 1: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 9 greater than ( number in box 6 )
Put ( number in box 4 ) into box 3
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 1 greater than ( number in box 8 )
Change Instruction 1: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 2
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 1 greater than ( number in box 2 )
Change Instruction 4: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Put ( number in box 1 ) into box 7
desc_zh: 相乘：3号盒子中的数字*1号盒子中的数字，将结果放在3号盒子中。
更改指令1：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令9中第2个盒子的编号比6号盒子中的数字大吗
将4号盒子中的数字放在3号盒子中
判断：指令1中第2个盒子的编号比8号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令1：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加2
判断：指令1中第1个盒子的编号比2号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令4：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加1
将1号盒子中的数字放在7号盒子中
